Before submitting a pull request, please make sure the following is done:

1. Fork [the repository](https://github.com/raphamorim/react-tv) and create your branch from `master`.
2. If you've added code that should be tested, add tests!
3. Format your code with [format](https://github.com/prettier/prettier) (just run `yarn prettier`).
4. Ensure the test suite passes and your code lints (`yarn test`).

-->
